section.title: ResizeMoveMaximize
section.para:
Combines the effects of
and
in a single command. When used on a maximized window, the window is resized and moved and is still in the maximized state afterwards. When used on an unmaximized window, the window is resized and put into the maximized state afterwards. This is useful if the user wants to resize the window temporarily and then return to the original geometry. The resize-arguments and move-arguments are the same as for the
command.
